channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for UT

item.title: Report X-2023070242
item.description:
Report X-2023070242

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-16T06:13:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-14
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: WEARING FULL PPE AND FOLLOWING DECISION TREE RESPONDED TO TRAILER, RESPONDER PLACED PACKAGE IN LINED SPILL TRAY AND RETURNED TO PROCESING CENTER FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. UPON INSPECTION OF INTERIOR CONTENTS RESPONDER DISCOVERED IT WAS HYDROCHLORIC ACID SOLUTION WITH NO INDICATION ON THE PACKAGING. HMSC CONFIRMED UNDECLARED STATUS. FOLLOWED UNDECLARED PROCESS.
